review: The Fire TV Stick was the perfect solution for my family room entertainment center. It replaced a Chromecast that just couldn't hold on to my wifi signal. The Fire Stick manages to keep an HD picture streaming with very little buffering while my Chromecast would often offer nothing but a spinning circle.The remote works well, and ships with batteries! It's tiny, so when you lose it (and you will) you can download an app to use on your phone or tablet. This app can offer up even more functionality like voice search.Fire TV Stick is definitely worth a look if you're in the market for a dedicated streaming device, especially if you're already a Prime member. I'd take it above my Chromecast and Roku.
